scripts.start: echo start in two terminals for now...
scripts.install:win: npm run i:db && npm run i:node && npm run i:deps && npm run i:win
scripts.i:deps: npm run i:c:dep && npm run i:s:dep
scripts.i:c:dep: cd c && npm i @angular/cli@v16-lts && npm i @swimlane/ngx-graph && npm i primeng@v16-lts
scripts.i:s:dep: cd s && npm i -S fastify@latest @mikro-orm/core @mikro-orm/sqlite && npm i -D prettier source-map-support
scripts.setup:win: npm run link:win && npm run lock:win && npm run audit:win
scripts.setup:nix: npm run link:nix && npm run lock:nix && npm run audit:nix
scripts.link:win: del /Q client && mklink client c && del /Q server && mklink /J server s
scripts.link:nix: ln -s client c && ln -s server s
scripts.lock:win: npm i --package-lock-only && cd c && npm i --package-lock-only && cd ..\s && npm i --package-lock-only
scripts.lock:nix: npm i --package-lock-only && cd c && npm i --package-lock-only && cd ../s && npm i --package-lock-only
scripts.audit:win: echo !!!AUDIT:CLIENT!!! && cd c && npm audit && cd ..\s && echo !!!AUDIT:SERVER!!! && npm run audit
scripts.audit:nix: echo !!!AUDIT:CLIENT!!! && cd c && npm audit && cd ../s && echo !!!AUDIT:SERVER!!! && npm run audit
